code: import{createSelector}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var getLoading=function getLoading(state){return state.contacts.loading;};var getFilter=function getFilter(state){return state.contacts.filter;};var getError=function getError(state){return state.contacts.error;};var getAllContacts=function getAllContacts(state){return state.contacts.items;};var getTotalContactCount=function getTotalContactCount(state){var contacts=getAllContacts(state);return contacts.length;};var getVisibleContacts=createSelector([getAllContacts,getFilter],function(contacts,filter){var normalizedFilter=filter.toLowerCase();return contacts.filter(function(_ref){var name=_ref.name;return name.toLowerCase().includes(normalizedFilter);});});var contactsSelectors={getLoading:getLoading,getFilter:getFilter,getError:getError,getAllContacts:getAllContacts,getVisibleContacts:getVisibleContacts,getTotalContactCount:getTotalContactCount};export default contactsSelectors;
